overview: Richard M. Domaleski is the founder of World Energy and has been the driving force behind the Companyâ€™s vision and sales execution. Recognizing the deregulation of retail energy as a watershed moment in the economy, he was one of the first to develop a solution to address this opportunity. In 1996, Rich co-founded World Energyâ€™s predecessor, Oceanside Energy, which became one of the first aggregators to be granted a FERC tariff. Since that time, he has brought together the speed and accessibility of the Internet with a powerful transaction model to create the Companyâ€™s award-winning exchanges, successfully guiding World Energy to a leadership position in the industry.
